title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / oA Group
description: The 'oA Group' represents a group. It contains an application group ID, a security group ID and a list of multicast and unicast IP addresses that are used in the group. \nAdditionally it contains a list of all members of the group.. objectID:'3389'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3389'. lwm2mVersion:'1.1'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `oA Group`.

ObjectVersion.description: Property. LWM2M Object versioning label.. resourceID:'4001'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Documentary Description.description: Property. Resource to hold a documentary text description of the object.. resourceID:'901'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Application Group ID.description: Property. Identifier of the application group. resourceID:'600'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Security Group ID.description: Property. Identifier of the security group. resourceID:'601'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

IP Addresses.description: Property. List of multicast and unicast IPv6 addresses to be used for outgoing group messages. resourceID:'602'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Members.description: Property. Link to the local object instances (and/or single resources) that are members of that group in CoRE Link Format [RFC6690](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6690)\nNote: instances and resources not listed here will not be addressable on this node through group messages of this group. resourceID:'603'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.
